key.name: maxfiles
key.description: This setting contains the number of files to keep in the Recently Opened Files menu. This value may be set to zero to disable the file history. This number has a maximum value of 10.

key.name: file0
key.description: This field contains the full path of the most recently opened file.

key.name: file1
key.description: This field contains the full path of the next most recently opened file.

key.name: file2
key.description: This field contains the full path of the next most recently opened file.

key.description: This field contains the full path of the next most recently opened file.

key.description: This field contains the full path of the next most recently opened file.
